thread.title: Probably the best place to stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Probably the best place to stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: alenpanov1
title: Probably the best place to stay in Paris
text:
Stayed in the residence Foch second time. As usual, it was very helpful, friendly and open heart staff, excellent room, good breakfast with fresh baguette, demi-sole breton butter and jambon. Location is perfect.
Room Tip: The best hotel price/quality/location See more room tips
